review: Haven't been able to use because of connection issues and the trouble shooting info with the stick has not been helpful.  Still struggling with getting it to work.  May have to return.
author: furgie

review: The "Stick" works great and is better than I thought was possible for such a small device. The variety of apps need to be increased. I mean where is "Showbox" I have it on my Kindle fire so why not as an app on the stick?
author: Walter Scott

review: Awesome device for $20.00 you can't beat that. Super fast and reliable.
author: Luis O. Giraudy

review: I love the option on my TV
author: ptayls

review: @ the introductory prime price this is the tech steal of the year.
author: Rob J

review: It was simple to set up, responds quickly, offers a lot of great options and apps. Can't find much fault with it and at the price it is simply a steal.
author: Gris Gris Man

review: very good and really nice to have a remote.
author: Amazon Customer
